inputs.remark:
缺少 V2、V3、V4。
V1 (发病当天早晨 - 自测)：纯音测听；Weber 测试；Bing 测试。
V2 (同一天晚些时候 - ENT 就诊)：听力图解读；处方泼尼松。
V3 (回家后 - 自我观察)：非正式音调匹配（双听确认）。
V4 (48小时后 - 随访)：纯音测听（复查）；主观症状评估。

logic_summary: Replaced expected_interpretations_by_visit to strictly follow the V1, V2, V3, V4 structure defined in REMARKS.
V1: Retained Pure-tone and Weber; added Bing Test; removed Pitch Matching.
V2: Added ENT visit details (Audiogram interpretation, Prednisone).
V3: Added Home observation details (Informal Pitch Matching).
V4: Added 48-hour follow-up details (Recovery Audiometry, Subjective Assessment).

value.collective_interpretation: Self-administered testing on the morning of onset confirmed a sudden sensorineural hearing loss in the right ear.

tests.name: Pure-tone audiometry
tests.result_summary: Left ear normal. Right ear severe SNHL sloping from 1 to 8 kHz (reaching 75-80 dB HL at 4-8 kHz); low frequencies (250-500 Hz) mild-to-moderate (20-25 dB HL).

tests.name: Weber Test
tests.result_summary: Lateralized to the left (better ear) at 1000 and 2000 Hz.

tests.name: Bing Test
tests.result_summary: Phonation of vowel /a/ increased in loudness when occluding either ear, consistent with a positive Bing test (no conductive component).

value.collective_interpretation: ENT consultation later the same day reviewed the audiometric results and prescribed steroids.

tests.name: Audiogram Interpretation
tests.result_summary: ENT reviewed patient's audiogram; confirmed SNHL diagnosis.

tests.name: Informal Pitch Matching
tests.result_summary: Music shifted upward in pitch by a full step when listening with the affected (right) ear compared to the good ear (confirmed by alternately plugging ears).

value.collective_interpretation: Follow-up 48 hours after starting prednisone showed significant recovery.

tests.name: Pure-tone audiometry (Recovery)
tests.result_summary: Right ear thresholds improved significantly, ranging from 15-20 dB HL in low frequencies to 30-45 dB HL in high frequencies (2-8 kHz).

tests.name: Subjective Symptom Assessment
tests.result_summary: Sound clarity returned to pre-event quality and the diplacusis sensation faded.
